description: Dungeon Clawler mixes deck building with a dash of rogue-like mechanics and most importantly: a claw machine.

1.0.0.description:
## Initial Release

- Randomize Fighters and Paws
- Randomize Combat Items
- Randomize Perks
- Enemysanity
- Traps
- Filler Money
- Starting shredders
- Deathlink
- Custom save system to not mess with your vanilla saves
1.0.0.title: Clawrchipelago Release 1.0.0

1.0.1.description:
## APworld
- Added more traps
- Improved logic for starting items (ethereal items are not valid damage!)

## Mod
- Fixed many display bugs
- Improved incoming items tracker to also show their source
- Reduce Debug log
- Fixed accidentally adding haunted items to inventory
- Implemented liquid and effect traps
- Implemented trap queue
- Fixed issue with floor 20 check sending only in endless
- Fixed unshuffled behavior for items and locations
- Added config file with a few customization options
1.0.1.title: Clawrchipelago Release 1.0.1

1.0.2.description:
- Add install guide to the README
- Cleanup a lot of code
- Add config to automatically check lower difficulty locations as you complete equivalent ones on a higher difficulty
- Improve build-publish process
1.0.2.title: Clawrchipelago Release 1.0.2

1.0.3.description:
- Added persistency to received items, preventing them from getting reprocessed upon reboot
- Added a few config settings
  - StartingMoneyAmount: Amount of gold from each starting money item (default: 5)
  - AllowStackingPerksWhenChecksAreDone: Once you are done sending all your perk checks, should you be able to pick perks that you already have, to increase their stack? (default: false). If disabled, you can still pick them but they won't get applied
- Fixed an issue where you could reach the end of your perks and get stuck in various rooms where you are forced to pick a perk. Now, some "real" perks (not checks) are added at the end of the candidates list. Related to the above config
- Fixed the build publishing process often being one version behind
1.0.3.title: Clawrchipelago Release 1.0.3
